org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell

Class FsUsage.TableBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.FsUsage.TableBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    FsUsage

    private static class FsUsage.TableBuilder
extends Object
    Creates a table of aligned values based on the maximum width of each column as a string
